items.sentence: Why would you want to do that if you don\'t have to?
Why wouldn\'t you let Tom go to Boston last weekend?
Tom said he hoped that Mary would come to his party.
It\'s not just Tom and Mary that have made mistakes.
Tom claimed that he\'d already given Mary the money.
No additional information is available at this time.
Tom wondered why he had never seen Mary here before.
Tom worked in a supermarket while he was in college.
I apologize for any problems that I may have caused.
I only weighed 120 pounds when I was in high school.
